sqlQueries.title: Scripts d'installation et de mises à jour de la base du VAS

query.code: -- Frédéric le 15/07/2016 15:21 UPDATE s_vitis.vm_table_button SET event = 'deleteUsers()' WHERE tab_id = (select tab_id from s_vitis.vm_tab where name = 'vitis_users') AND label_id = 'vitis_6';
ALTER FUNCTION s_vitis.is_vitis_admin() OWNER TO u_vitis;

ALTER TABLE s_vitis."user" ADD CONSTRAINT check_u_vitis CHECK (name::text != 'u_vitis'::text) ALTER TABLE s_vitis."user" ADD CONSTRAINT check_postgres CHECK (name::text != 'postgres'::text) -- Armand 06/02/2018 15:31 ALTER TABLE s_vitis.domain ALTER COLUMN password TYPE character varying(255);
